name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deskpotify: Search in Spotify Desktop App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the right-click menu to search for the selected text in the Spotify desktop application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jump into Spotify Desktop App and search selected text easily.
* Required a Windows desktop application of Spotify.
